titleInfo.title: Words, Wood, and Wire at Southern Illinois University

mods.abstract: Three color window card (brown, light brown, and green on beige) announcing Words, Wood, and Wire: The History of Southern Illinois at Southern Illinois University's University Museum. Poster features woodcuts of stars and a metal photoplate of a map of Illinois.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
